resources.string: write the title of your message

string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: The official currency of Kuwait is the Kuwaiti riyal?
Toubkal is the highest mountain peak in the Arab world?
Algeria is the largest Arab country in terms of area?
Casablanca is the capital of Morocco?
Kabul is the capital of Afghanistan?
The largest invertebrate animal is the jellyfish?
The Arab country that the Equator passes through is Sudan?
Is the heart the largest organ in the human body?
The first mosque in Islam is the Prophets Mosque?
The only uncle of your cousins ​​is your father?
The worlds first banana producer is Ecuador?
Argentina its capital Baku?
The currency of Vietnam is dong?

string-array.name: answers_details
